snippet: The Farrelly brothers finally get their version of the Three Stooges on the screen, with a plot borrowed from the “Blues Brothers” and an appearance on “Jersey Shore.”
abstract: Peter and Bobby Farrelly finally get their version of The Three Stooges on the screen; say the classic comedy team never received the respect they deserved; film brings Farrelly brothers full circle, back to the anarchy and slapstick antics that launched their careers.
lead_paragraph: The Farrelly brothers finally get their version of the Three Stooges on the screen, with a plot borrowed from the “Blues Brothers” and an appearance on “Jersey Shore.”

headline.seo: The Farrelly Brothers on Their ‘Three Stooges’
